snippet.title: Projection: First Light - Available now on Apple Arcade℠!
snippet.description:
🎉 Find it on Apple Arcade℠! 🎉

📱: https://apple.co/-FirstLight

---

In “Projection: First Light”, players follow the adventures of Greta, a girl living in a mythological shadow puppet world as she embarks on a journey of self-enlightenment, helped by legendary heroes from ancient cultures along the way.

Available on Apple Arcade for iPhone®.
Apple TV®, iPad®, and macOS® versions will also be released soon.

---

Projection Twitter ► http://twitter.com/ProjectionFL
Projection Facebook ► https://www.facebook.com/ProjectionGame/

Blowfish Studios Twitter ► http://bit.ly/2PkYmHq
Blowfish Studios Facebook ► http://bit.ly/2LGKwNr
Blowfish Studios Instagram ► http://bit.ly/2MDhRxW

---
